about_the_game:
『SUPER ALICE DOLLS!』 is a 2D platform action game , Touhou Project fan game, crafted with the adorable essence of Alice is Cute!
Alice will use the abilities of various dolls to conquer the level.
Note: The demo version allows you to play up to 3W.

Features

  • Stage-clearing 2D action game.
    　The basic concept is the familiar orthodox platform action.
  • Depending on the dolls available in the stage, Alice can use different kinds of abilities.
  • The system is a bit gentle, allowing character to come back even if they fall into a hole!
  • Two players can play in local multiplayer.
    Two players can help each other and play more easily.
  • If you have a button setting for 2P from the config,
    If the button for 2P is pressed during the game, 2P will appear at any time.
    2P mode is canceled when returning to the title.

About Two-Player Gameplay with Steam Remote Play Together

After inviting the player you want to play with, assign Controller 2 to the invited player.



At this point, the Player 2 controller on the Remote Play client side will not function yet.
When you enter the button configuration menu, inputs will be recognized.
Please proceed to Config → Button Setting within the game, start the configuration for Player 2, and press the buttons for Player 2 to set them."



(Note: Menu navigation in the title or config screens cannot be done by Player 2.)
After configuration, Player 2 will automatically appear in the game when Player 2 inputs are detected!

Story


One day, many dolls disappeared from Alice!
Let's go look for them! Once the doll is recovered, Alice will be powered up!
※There is no scenario part in the game!
Guidelines for Live Gameplay
Feel free to distribute SUPER ALICE DOLLS gameplay!
We would be glad if you could include the game title "SUPER ALICE DOLLS" in the distribution so that it will be easier for the author to find it.
It would be great if you could indicate the Steam store page in the description of the distribution, etc., so that it would be easier for those who view the distribution to find the work.

name: SUPER ALICE DOLLS Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Core2Duo or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX750 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: 『SUPER ALICE DOLLS!』 is a 2D platform action game , Touhou Project fan game, crafted with the adorable essence of Alice is Cute! Alice will use the abilities of various dolls to conquer the level.
